messages.title: For real change and a fairer Britain, more and more people are switching to back the Liberal Democrats for the first time.
messages.content: At the heart of our fairer tax plan launched by Vince Cable and myself.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: With the Liberal Democrats, you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn. This will mean millions of low earners and pensioners will pay no tax at all. It will mean people who earn over £10,000 will get an extra £700 in their pocket.

mentions.tacticalSituation: PS - Remember in many parts of Britain, Labour simply can’t win. The choice is between real change with the Liberal Democrats or no change with the Conservatives.

issues.economy: The bankers certainly seem to be doing quite well! They are once again getting their huge bonuses as if the credit crunch and bank bail-outs had never happened. While ordinary people face a squeeze on earnings and tax rises, millionaires and the very rich can often dodge paying taxes.
issues.health: With the Conservatives our NHS will not be safe and their single biggest tax top priority is a tax cut for millionaires.

quotes.text: This is Gordon Brown’s Britain and it’s shameful.

images.caption: Nick Clegg, Leader of the Liberal Democrats
